column4: I've installed Ibex.  It is common for various processes, daemons, whatever to send notification emails as necessary.  Are there configurations that I have to do to sendmail (exim) for the email to get out, or is there an operable configuration already setup?
I think you have to set it up so it forwards mails to some external smtp server.. also you have to make sure to use real addresse.. not just root@mygamingbox
something like that.. but probably by editing some obscure text file somewhere.. I don't know the specifics but I think it's the same stuff you have to do if you just want to run your own mail server
there should be lots of howto's out there. hope you find something good, that works for you
